verses.name: John 12:42
verses.text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him, lest they should be put out of the synagogue:

verses.name: John 12:43
verses.text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God.

verses.name: John 12:44
verses.text: Jesus cried and said, He that believeth on me, believeth not on me, but on him that sent me.

verses.name: John 12:45
verses.text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me.

verses.name: John 12:46
verses.text: I am come a light into the world, that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness.
